passives.name: Lead the Way
passives.effects: While moving, generate 7 stacks of ''Momentum'' every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, granting up to {{as|20 '''bonus''' movement speed}} at 100 stacks after {{fd|3.75}} seconds of moving. At '''maximum''' stacks, you leave behind a path briefly that grants {{as|15% of your '''total''' movement speed}} as {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} to allied champions within. Basic attacks consume all stacks. If you are {{tip|melee}} and at '''maximum''' stacks, your next basic attack {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 50% for 1 second.
